summary: Vince Hackett's gang steals a prized victory canon from Mexico and blames the deed on ex-gang member Jess Wade who wants to go straight.
cast: Elvis Presley|Ina Balin|Victor French|Barbara Werle|Solomon Sturges|Lynn Kellogg|Paul Brinegar|Harry Landers|Tony Young|James Almanzar|Charles H. Gray|John Pickard|Garry Walberg|Duane Grey|Rodd Redwing|J. Edward McKinley|Robert Luster|James Sikking|Jacqui Brandt|Katherine Darc|Kathleen Darc|Arnie Frank|Charlie Hodge|Robert Karnes|Christa Lang|John Patino|Megan Timothy
title: Charro
